EmailTemplate.name: Scholarship Overpayment
EmailTemplate.subject: Scholarship Overpayment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Unfortunately, there has been an overpayment from your <Scholarship name> for the amount of $ with the following details:
Reason for overpayment: XXX
Dates of overpayment:
An invoice is attached. Could you please arrange for the invoice to be paid according to its term. Should you have any questions please feel free to contact: mge-scholarships@monash.edu _______________________ ​ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia T: +61 3 990 53009 W: www.monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: www.monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
{!Case.Thread_Id}
